scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:policy
scripts.test:unit: node tests/unit/pets.pull-merge.test.js && node tests/unit/pet-to-patch.test.js && node tests/unit/outbox-coalescing.test.js && node tests/unit/consent.service.test.js && node tests/unit/eligibility.service.test.js && node tests/unit/explanation.service.test.js && node tests/unit/rbac.middleware.test.js && node tests/unit/tag.service.test.js
scripts.test:smoke:strict: set STRICT_NETWORK=1&& set STRICT_ALLOW_HOSTS=cdnjs.cloudflare.com&& playwright test --project=chromium --grep @smoke
